$comment: Represents data for when a staff member 9user) updates an object, and when they had done so.
title: StaffUpdate

by.$comment: Represents a person who uses the platform.
by.title: User

name.description: A non-empty string holding the user's name.

email.description: A non-empty string with an '@' symbol, holding the user's email.

by.description: The user who has performed the update.

oneOf.description: Number of seconds after the Unix epoch
An ISO 6801 timestamp akin to JSON Schema's `date-time`, but only accepts times in UTC. Note that decimal places after the number of seconds are not allowed.

date.description: A timestamp showing when the user performed the update.
